text: Layer may refer to: * A layer of archaeological deposits in an excavation * A layer hen, a hen kept to produce eggs * Layered clothing, wearing multiple layers of clothing ==Fiction== * Layer, a female Maverick Hunter in the Mega Man X series ==Science== * Stratum, a layer of rock or soil with similar composition * Thermocline, a layer of temperature within an area of water ==Technology== ===Computing=== * Abstraction layer, a way of hiding the specifications of a function ** OSI model layers ** Internet protocol suite layers * 2D computer graphics#Layers, layers in two-dimensional (2D) computer graphics * Layers (digital image editing), used in digital image editing to separate different elements of an image ===Electronics=== * DVD layer, such as in DVD dual layer recording * Layer (electronics), a single thickness of some material covering a surface
title: Layer
